Call Us 800-334-2913 or Email
View Our Pontoon Models
Build Your Own Pontoon
Download Our 2019 Catalog

The Best Pontoon Boats for Over 45 Years

Our 2019 Models Are Here!

We have an exciting lineup of luxury pontoon models ready for the 2019 season. Check back soon for new and improved options!

View Our 2019 Boat Models Here »

Since 1972, Avalon has been committed to building the highest quality pontoon boats, all manufactured right here in the USA. We specialize in luxury, high-performance boats and offer them at an exceptional value. Highlighting our commitment to quality, all Avalon pontoons come with a lifetime structural warranty alongside our comprehensive 5-year warranty. Our boats can be outfitted with a wide variety of options including inviting lounges, gas grills, wakeboard racks and even water slides. Whether you are sunbathing, fishing, swimming, skiing, or just cruising around, Avalon pontoon boats can take you there in comfort and style. Avalon Pontoons come in a wide range of styles and sizes, from a 14' economy pontoon all the way up to a 27' luxury pontoon boat. See our 2019 models and choose the one that's just right for you.

View more videos
